SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.recorder

Class Recorder

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.recorder.Recorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class Recorder extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
Game Recorder class. Implements PropertyChangeListener and listens for Game State related changes and records them into a Map of Ticks to Changes. Changes are stored as a HashMap of Identifier String to Change Object
Author:
LachlanPC

    • handleChange

      public void handleChange(int tick, String identifier, Object change)
      Handles a change event adding it to the Map of tick to events. Identifier ensures the same tile location or gamestate object can't update more than once per tick.
      Parameters:
      tick - - Integer tick number event took place on
      identifier - - Unique String identifier for type of/location of update
      change - - Changed Object

    • getReplay

      public Replay getReplay()
      Get current replay.
      Returns:
      Replay - Replay record of Tick Map.
